name: Advantages of scATAC-seq
back:
1. Minor subpopulations can be hard to detect unless deeper sequencing is performed
2. scATAC-seq makes it possible to map regulomes in individual cells

name: Advantages of ATAC-seq
front: Tumors and tissues in different developmental states, containing multiple subpopulations with different epigenomic profiles can be identified
back: ATAC-seq captures all open chromatin regions, not just those bound by a specific factor. It is an unbiased (genome-wide) approach to look for epigenetic changes in a sample.
